Here's my Youtube subscriptions with RSS and web links for your convenience.

```{r, echo=F, warning=F, message=F}
library(rvest)
library(xml2)
library(purrr)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)

read_xml("~/Downloads/subscription_manager.xml") %>%
  xml_node("outline") %>%
  xml_contents() %>%
  map_df(function(x) {
           tibble::tibble(title = xml_attr(x, "title"),
                          url_rss = xml_attr(x, "xmlUrl"),
                          url_web = str_replace(url_rss, "feeds\\/videos\\.xml\\?channel_id=", "channel\\/"))
         }) %>%
  transmute(`#` = seq_along(title),
            Channel = paste0("[", title, "](", url_web, ")"),
            RSS = paste0("[<i class='fa fa-rss'></i>](", url_rss, ")")) %>%
  knitr::kable(escape = F)
```
